entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extend GetDataTipText to support hover on expressions #72729
  • Compiler cannot parse nullable types in pattern matching #72720
  • EnC: convert EditAndContinueLanguageService to service broker service #72713
  • IDE0078 should be configurable to only apply to type checks #72711
  • csharp_new_line_before_open_brace Styling Rule backwards #72710
  • Unsupported .editorconfig properties are silently ignored #72709
  • Unnecessary creation of ITextBuffer just to get a checksum #72703

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: SourceTextTokenParser #72518
    17.10
  • NRE in ConversionsBase.ClassifyImplicitConversionFromType #72541
    17.10
  • Rename toggle button not shown up in light theme #72681
  • No error reported for overload ambiguity with extension methods with identical signatures and `params` arrays #72696
  • A ton of C# keywords are missing in `langword` doc comment tag completions #72258
    Backlog
  • c# struct operator taking "in" (byref) fails to report CS8374 when used with "this" and can expose internals / cause stack corruption #72239
    17.10
  • ref safety broken with cast operators #71773
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Update config for 17.10 P3 snap #72728
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Snap 17.10 P3 #72727
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Modify BinderFactory to use a shared pool instead of one per BinderFactory instance. #72725
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Store and display the times when files were generated. #72724
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version" #72723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove serialization of SourceTexts #72722
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add some crash dump tips for Linux #72719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove additional parts of legacy diagnostics system. #72718
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Compiler server fixes #72716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IEmbeddedLanguageClassificationService is optional in the workspaces layer #72712
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Serialize the content hash for a source text so it does not need to be recomputed #72705
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add CreateTokenParser public API #72622
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Speed up go-to-def by utilizing frozen snapshots #72714
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Simplify service export #72707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Do not call `IsBetterCollectionExpressionConversion` for identical collection types. #72706
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, 17.10 P3
  • Follow up on addition of `InternalSpecialType` #72704
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Remove unused portions of the legacy diagnostic service. #72702
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Provide all possible keywords in xml doc comment `langword` tag #72694
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • generate package for clasp binary to ensure symbols exist #72686
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Add Emit3 to `-testCompilerOnly` build flag #72685
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Bind to the background of border #72682
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, 17.10 P3
  • Remove invisible character in official pipeline yaml #72665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Using Segmented collections to avoid LOH allocations #72656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10 P3
  • Hande error scenarios involving target types and named arguments in nullable walker #72635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.10 P3

Updated

  • Disallow dynamic calls on ref struct receivers #72674
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix infinite load loop loading WPF projects in VSCode #72625
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72654
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose a way for Razor to register capabilities into the AlwaysActivateInProcLanguageClient #72609
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch into extensions branch #72684
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.10
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Correct active statement span tracking #72690
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Update segmented collections from v5.0.2 reference sources to v8.0.3 #72687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
